text:
Hey Alex! How are you? For a quick intro, my name is Juba, been working as an animator at Framestore for 2 years now, and in the industry for about 4 years. I studied 3D animation at Vancouver Film School in Canada, where I made my first short
Either way, I still have so much to learn, but I'd be happy to help in anyway I can =)
If you'd like, tell me a little about yourself too :smiley:
